title: can this pc run league of legends

embed.description: Procesorius - 1,8 Ghz AMD Sempron 3500+ RAM - 2 Gb DDRKietas diskas - 120 Gb Ekranas - 17"WiFi, kamera,

body: so im going to buy this laptop and i want to ask you guys can this laptop  run league of legends atleast on low grafics ?

replies.body: Looking for a new rig to game on is an exciting time, but I'm not particular about endorsing a specific one.  Instead, I recommend bookmarking our [minimum requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to use as a comparison chart to help you make a decision best fit for you.  I wish you the best of luck!
